vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to grow weak, grow dim, grow faint, falter, be weak, be dim, be darkened, be restrained, be faint, fail
1a) (Qal) to grow dim
1b) (Piel) to faint, grow weak, grow faint
§ 1) to grow weak, grow dim, grow faint, falter, be weak, be dim, be darkened, be restrained, be faint, fail
1a) (Qal) to grow dim
1b) (Piel) to faint, grow weak, grow faint
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1) qal   debilitarse, desmayarse\pi. (= qal); (2) pi.   reprochar
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 逐漸微弱, 逐漸微暗, 逐漸衰弱
1a) (Qal) 逐漸微暗, 逐漸衰弱
1b) (Piel) 逐漸衰弱
2) 斥責
2a) (Piel) 斥責 (撒上3:13)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 逐渐微弱, 逐渐微暗, 逐渐衰弱
1a) (Qal) 逐渐微暗, 逐渐衰弱
1b) (Piel) 逐渐衰弱
2) 斥责
2a) (Piel) 斥责 (撒上3:13)
